protocol.name: P-G15165-1
protocol.text: Plants were grown in a Conviron chamber under continuous light with fluorescent lamps at 20°C and 50% - 70% relative humidity.

protocol.name: P-G15165-2
protocol.text: Siliques between 1.8-2.0 cm long containing mature green-stage seeds were collected from 38-46 day old plants. Siliques were sub-divided and fixed in 3:1 (v/v) ethanol to acetic acid and embedded in paraffin. Microdissection of compartments was carried out on sections using a Leica LMD6000 system.

protocol.name: P-G15165-3
protocol.text: 5 to 6 ng of total RNA was amplified using the WT-Ovation Pico RNA Amplification System (NuGEN, San Carlos, CA). cDNAs were fragmented and labeled with NuGEN FL-Ovation™ cDNA Biotin Module V2.

protocol.name: P-G15165-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted using the RNaqueous Micro-Kit (Ambion, Austin, TX) using a modified protocol incorporating an on-column DNase treatment (Qiagen RNase-Free DNase Set) during column washes.
